page.title: 08RELIGION(cont.)
page.content: ---------PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH--------- * * * * * * * * * * * THIS CHURCH WAS ERECTED IN 1830 AND AT PRESENT SERVES THE ELDERS AND MEMBERS EACH SUNDAY AT 10.30am.IT IS A STONE RECTANGULAR STRUCTURE. THE ENTRANCE DOOR IS AT THE GABLE END FACING CHURCH STREET.INSIDE AT THE TOP IS THE PREACHERS PULPIT WHERE THERE IS A BIBLE STAND COVERED WITH BLUE VELVET. ON EITHER SIDE OF THE PULPIT IS AN ELECTRIC BRASS LAMP,ON THE DAIS INFRONT OF THE PULPIT IS THE HARMONIMUM WHILE THE HYMN BOARD HANGS BEHIND THE PULPIT. THE CHURCH OF IRELAND * * * * * * * * * * AT THE ENTRANCE THERE IS A SMALL PORCH ,AN OLDISH GREY STAIRS LEADS UP TO THE GALLERY AND A THICK ROPE FROM THE BELL
